text: Morten Peter Meldal (born 16 January 1954) is a Danish chemist. He was awarded the 2022 Nobel Prize in Chemistry. He is known for developing the CuAAC-click reaction.Tornøe, C.W. and Meldal, M., Peptidotriazoles: Copper(I)-catalyzed 1,3-dipolar cycloadditions on solid-phase. In: Lebl, M., Houghten, R.A. (Eds.), American Peptide Society and Kluwer Academic Publishers, San Diego, 2001, pp. 263–4. and Meldal, M., Peptidotriazoles on solid-phase. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Danish chemists
title: Morten P. Meldal
